content.title: Intro
content.content:
2015
Preceded by
2015
2016
Year
2017
Followed by
2017

Tolkien-related events that took place in 2016.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - Birthday Toast.
? - Amon Hen 257 is published.

content.title: March
content.content:
25 - Tolkien Reading Day.
? - Amon Hen 258 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
3 - Actor Erik Bauersfeld dies.
5 - The Story of Kullervo is published in the USA.
7 - A Secret Vice, a extended edition of J.R.R. Tolkien's lecture, is published.

content.title: May
content.content:
31 - The Lord of the Rings Movie Trilogy Coloring Book is published.
? - Amon Hen 259 is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
9 - The Return Of The Ring: Proceedings of the Tolkien Society Conference 2012 is published.
26 - Scholar John Ellison dies.

content.title: July
content.content:
28 - Leaf by Niggle, is published in its own volume.
? - Amon Hen 260 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
1 - Songs of Sorrow and Hope: The Art of Jenny Dolfen is published.
1 - Tolkien Calendar 2017 is published.
3-4 - Middle-earth Festival at Sarehole Mill, Birmingham.
8 - 11 - Oxonmoot 2016 at St Antony's College.
22 - The Hobbit Facsimile First Edition is published.
23 - Actor William Johnson dies.
? - Amon Hen 261 is published.

content.title: October
content.content: 19 - The posthumous publication, Beren and LÃºthien, edited by Christopher Tolkien, is announced for publication on 4 May 2017.

content.title: November
content.content:
3 - The Lay of Aotrou and Itroun is published.
3 - The Bodleian Library presented the Bodley Medal to Christopher Tolkien, the Library's highest honour.
24 - Laughter in Middle-earth is published.
? - Amon Hen 262 is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
1 - A Well of Wonder: C. S. Lewis, J. R. R. Tolkien, and The Inklings is published.
6 - Actor Peter Vaughan dies.
19 - Daybreak Game Company becomes the new publisher of The Lord of the Rings Online.
